aboutUs.tab1heading2: At Real Generosity, we empower individuals to turn compassion into action. Because that is how change happens.
aboutUs.tab1p1: Real Generosity provides a platform to connect Lebanese people and helps our society through the economic crisis.
aboutUs.tab1p2: It covers the needs of those who cannot afford to purchase some essential items such as clothes, furniture, medics, appliances, toys and books.
aboutUs.tab1p3: It makes it simple and easy for donors to share the stuff they’re willing to donate as well as easy for seekers  to browse the goods they need.
aboutUs.v1p: We assure that throughout the process of donation and request preserve sense of user self-worth.
aboutUs.v2p: User’s privacy is fully taken into consideration. Certain personal information are only exposed with previous notice.
aboutUs.v3p: According to our terms and agreements, no false or fake donations or request are to be submitted.
aboutUs.q1: Are ID cards exposed to the public?
aboutUs.a1: No, ID cards are used only for authentication isuue.
aboutUs.q2: Who can check my personal information?
aboutUs.a2: Only those who have obtained the approval of the request
aboutUs.q3: How many times can get a Donation?
aboutUs.a3: There is no specific times,it's depends on the donor if he will approve the request or no
aboutUs.tab3p: Any further question? you can get in contact with us

signup.idupload: Kindly, upload your ID card here
